title: Emerald Grandeur: Diamond and Emerald Bridal Haaram
materials: Brilliant Cut Diamonds (approximately 4.80 carats). Features meticulously set Panadi diamonds and marquise cut diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: A breathtaking layered Haaram featuring floral motifs intricately crafted with brilliant-cut diamonds. Lush, oval-cut and pear-shaped emeralds are meticulously bezel set and prong set creating a stunning contrast. The design embodies both traditional South Indian aesthetics and contemporary sophistication. The graduated emeralds and diamond arrangement creates a mesmerizing cascade effect, ideal for a bride.
colors: and warm yellow gold create a rich and captivating color palette.
occasions: or any grand celebration where you desire to make a statement.
description: This Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and superior craftsmanship. The combination of high-quality emeralds and diamonds ensures a dazzling display of light and color. Its exquisite design and enduring value make it a treasured heirloom to be cherished for generations. The piece embodies the opulence of Hyderabadi jewelry tradition.
